the pursuit of happiness

60 minutes - Happiness

to be happy is to have low expectations
so when things become slightly better, you become happy

the better word would be that Denmark people are content because they have less to worry about.
they are happy with what they have.

america is UNHAPPY.
because they've grown up with the notion that more is better.
affluent zipcodes have the highest conc. of sad people
the indicator of happiness is close relationships with people

last line of advice: americans, don't pursue the American dream
